editors.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title></title>
    <style>
      body {
        white-space: pre;
        font-family: monospace;
        font-size: 200%;
      }
      
      button {
        display: block;
        transform: scale(3);
        margin: 50px 100px;
      }
      
      button.item-disabled {
        opacity: 0.3;
      }
      
      button.item-focused {
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 120, 255, 0.4);
      }
      
      button.item-hovered {
        box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 120, 255, 0.3) inset;
      }

      button.item-active {
        transform: scale(2.9);
      }
      
      button.item-hasicon {
        padding-left: 2em;
      }
      
      button.item-hasicon::before {
        content: 'üëç';
        left: 0.6em;
        position: absolute;
        top: -0.1em;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    
    <button>–ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞</button>
    
  </body>
</html>
editors.js: 'use strict';

  <body>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title></title>
    <style>
      body {
        white-space: pre;
        font-family: monospace;
        font-size: 200%;
      }
      
      button {
        display: block;
        transform: scale(3);
        margin: 50px 100px;
      }
      
      button.item-disabled {
        opacity: 0.3;
      }
      
      button.item-focused {
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 120, 255, 0.4);
      }
      
      button.item-hovered {
        box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 120, 255, 0.3) inset;
      }

      button.item-active {
        transform: scale(2.9);
      }
      
      button.item-hasicon {
        padding-left: 2em;
      }
      
      button.item-hasicon::before {
        content: 'üëç';
        left: 0.6em;
        position: absolute;
        top: -0.1em;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    
  </body>
</html>
